item.title: Buck Dharma
item.description: Donald Brian Roeser, more commonly known by his stage name Buck Dharma, is an American guitarist and songwriter, best known for being the sole constant member of Blue Öyster Cult since the group's formation in 1967. He wrote and sang vocals on several of the band's best-known hits, including '(Don't Fear) The Reaper,' 'Godzilla' and 'Burnin' for You.'
